info.name: Money Dashboard Dark
info.description:
Staying on top of your money is easy... on the eyes
A dark theme for UK-based personal finance and budgeting site Money Dashboard.
info.additionalInfo:
Changelog

  • v1.2.1 (2020-02-28)
    • Caught a few missing styles in the Tag manager
  • v1.2.0 (2020-02-27)
    • Mostly a change in the way I work on the code
      • Now hosted on GitHub
    • Added styles for the "hero" page, to darken that too
  • v1.1.5 (2020-02-24)
    • Caught a few missing styles in Transactions and Accounts
  • v1.1.4 (2020-02-21)
    • Reacted to a lot of changes to the site's CSS. Everything works again!
  • v1.1.3 (2019-06-28)
    • Styled the close account dialogues
  • v1.1.2 (2019-06-25)
    • Updated a few small styles due to changes in the site
  • v1.1.1 (2019-06-24)
    • Updated a few small styles due to changes in the site
  • v1.1 (2019-06-20)
    • Added styling for Spend Report
    • Added styling for Add Account
  • v1.0 (2019-06-20)
    • Initial version
